actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2234 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 25. Record Vote Number: 4.

Amendment SA 2234 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 2233. (consideration: CR S166-168; text: CR S166) To limit the liability of the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation with respect to a plan for which a reduced deficit contribution is elected.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2234 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 25. Record Vote Number: 4.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2234 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 2233.

amends_amendment.purpose: Substitute amendment to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to temporarily change the determination of the interest rate used for funding and other purposes from use of the 30-year treasury bond rate to a composite corporate bond rate, and for other purposes.

purpose: To limit the liability of the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation with respect to a plan for which a reduced deficit contribution is elected.
